Title: Silverlight Puzzle Diamonds
HomeWiki:
Project Description

This is the Silverlight version of my first XNA game, Puzzle Diamonds, it is a basic puzzle game inspired by Boubble Breaker, the goal of the game is to cleanup the diamonds grid by selecting a group of two or more diamonds of the same color.

Here are some screens from the game:



Puzzle Diamonds need the Silverlight 1.1 alpha run time installed, to play the game please follow this link

For any comments/suggestion/bugs fell free to contact me on my blog

hope you enjoy,
